text_block_list.text:
On a day off. While wandering around town, I happened to spot 
Cesario. When she noticed me, she started walking towards me.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Good afternoon! 
Trainer are you heading somewhere?
choice_data_list: I just did some shopping, what about you?
I just did some shopping, what about you?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I'm heading to go see a comedy♪ 
It's a popular work called 『Dreams of a Restless Lord』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. It's a performance I've always wanted to see…… 
I was so excited I could barely sleep yesterday.

A sudden thought entered my mind upon seeing Cesario in such a 
happy mood. Wasn't this a good chance to get to know her better?
choice_data_list: Hey, are tickets still being sold?
Hey, are tickets still being sold?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Umm, on the website it says that tickets are 
being sold there……Ah, Trainer, are you perhaps――!
choice_data_list: If you're okay with it, let's see it together

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Waaah……! 
Fufuu, of course! Please!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It's all open seating, so we can sit together! 
C'mon, let's get going!

text_block_list.name: Actor A
text_block_list.text:
This can't be happening, it's impossible that my mansion 
was seized! I can't believe it! ……this has to be a dream, 
without a doubt! Hurry and wake me from this dream-!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Actor B
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear, you've said the same thing everyday, how 
are you not tired of it…… You are not dreaming. You've 
lost your mansion and now have nowhere to sleep.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Ahaa……Fu, fufuu.

Cesario seemed to be having fun, expressing 
various emotions, including her childish-side. 
Her usual seriousness was nowhere to be seen.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Haaa～, I don't think I'll be able to sleep much tonight 
either. I think I'll just keep thinking about this, fufu♪
choice_data_list: You were laughing the whole time
You were laughing the whole time

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Ah……well, I just couldn't hold it in…… 
Sorry, was I too noisy?
choice_data_list: No way! I'm glad you were having fun!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad…… Besides, it really was entertaining, after all. 
My cheeks are still sore. I wonder if I'll have cramps later.
choice_data_list: How about heading to a cafe next?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Let's do that, Fufuu.

While drinking coffee, we took a breather. 
But it didn't seem like Cesario was any less excited.
choice_data_list: You must have really liked that comedy
You must have really liked that comedy

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. 
Ever since I was little I've loved them.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……right about when I first started looking up to 
my parents, and wanting to become a 『Guiding Light』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I have a dream I want to accomplish―― 
that's all my head was filled with at the time.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But at that time, I couldn't properly put my 
feelings in to words. I was tense all the time.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And so the fatigue started to accumulate…… 
to the point I collapsed.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. But I was still young. My parents both took 
the day off and decided to take me to the theater.

text_block_list.name: Young Cesario
text_block_list.text: But, I want to stay home and study……

text_block_list.name: Cesario's Father
text_block_list.text:
You're a good girl so today won't you tag along with us on 
our day off? This play is supposed to be really interesting!

text_block_list.name: Cesario's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Right, today, let's not talk about studying. Or our work. 
Let's just laugh. ――Look, it's starting……!

text_block_list.name: Actor C
text_block_list.text:
Master, these are sunny-side up eggs that were made from an 
egg with two yolks. A sign of good luck. Please enjoy.

text_block_list.name: Actor D
text_block_list.text:
What are you saying!? Isn't this a bad omen!? If good luck 
were to visit us here, then only trouble would follow!

text_block_list.name: Young Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Pfft…… 
Fufuu, ahahahaa♪

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
At first I thought it was a waste of time 
but, before I knew it――I was drawn in!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Just like today, by the time the play was over, 
my cheeks were hurting. ……and all that tension was gone.

text_block_list.name: Cesario's Father
text_block_list.text:
Listen, Cesario. Dreams are something you have to 
chase after deseperately. Otherwise they won't come true.

text_block_list.name: Cesario's Father
text_block_list.text:
But, it's just as important to relax and give yourself 
peace of mind. That's why we wanted to go as a family!

text_block_list.name: Cesario's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Right. Sometimes there are things you can only 
see when you relax. Just like there are things 
you can only accomplish if you work hard.

text_block_list.name: Cesario's Mother
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure that Cesario knows what I mean. 
After all, you're our daughter, we're proud of you.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
After that, I gradually became aware of what I had learned, 
and a little bit at a time, I became able to switch on and off.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And that's why I love comedies, not just because 
they're interesting. They were also the reason 
I learned something important from my parents.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I came to love my parents even more, 
and it's a memory that made me respect them more and more.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: And it made me realize that 『Teachers』 are amazing!

From the clear look in her eyes, it was obvious 
just how deep the love for her parents was.
choice_data_list: You really respect your parents, huh?
You really respect your parents, huh?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes, alot! If it weren't for what they both 
taught me, I might not be here right now.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……That's why, I want to become a 『Guiding Light for 
future Uma Musume』, so when I look back at 『Now』, that――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
――even my parents' names might be engraved 
in to history as the 『Origin of that Light』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Just how wonderful would that be? The origin of that 
dream would also become a part of that dream.
choice_data_list: We can carry all of that in to the future
We can carry all of that in to the future

text_block_list.text:
I was unexpectedly able to learn just how 
far in to the future Cesario was looking.

If I were to put this feeling in to words, I want 
to make sure this grand dream becomes an even more 
magnificent story……I couldn't help but feel that way.
